selected_skills.name: extract_ages_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract the ages of two people from the provided image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to extract the ages of Person 1 and Person 2.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute the age gap by subtracting the age of Person 1 from the age of Person 2.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the extracted ages to form a subtraction expression and compute the result.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer to be returned.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the computed age gap to format the answer as a single line.
